class_notes: Section #100 is for BSN semester 3 students only.
course_description: The course focuses on integration and synthesis of content from nursing, science, and humanities classes, with application to planning and providing comprehensive patient care. Emphasis on situational learning through structured opportunities allows students to develop and hone clinical judgment.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4169, Section #: 100, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 8-9:50a, Instructor: N. Matthie, Status: Closed
